special_text:
[+2]: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a permanent card. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[-3]: Copy the next permanent spell you cast this turn. [i](The copy becomes a token.)[/i]
[-9]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a permanent spell, draw a card” and “The first permanent spell you cast each turn costs {0}.”
